text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Zine al-Abidine Ben Ali chaired a cabinet meeting on regional developpent.
- Arab ministers of culture hold a 48-hour conference on culture and development in Tunis.
- Tunisia and Malta aim to boost trade and investment between the two countries.
- Egyptian Prime Minister Kamal Ganzouri to start a three-day official visit to Tunisia. He will preside with his Tunisian counterpart Hamed Karoui over a high joint commission meeting.
- Tunisia and Italy discuss cooperation on environment issues.
- Social Affairs Minister Chedli Neffati announces social measures including rate reduction by two points to 13 percent of employers subscription to social security fund.
